Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In Venezuela, the Orinoco River was the first to be discovered in the new world and was thought to be the route to El Dorado.

Clip.Title: MYSTICAL JOURNEY: KUMBH MELA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: West meets East when acclaimed actor Dominic West joins his childhood friend on a pilgrimage to Northern India and the biggest religious festival in the world, Kumbh Mela. Here, 100 million Hindus have gathered to wash away their sins in the holy rivers near Allahabad, on the banks of Sangam. It is also where Dominic's friend Sir James Mallinson will be initiated into a senior role called a mahant. Follow these friends on this incredible two-week journey, and submerge yourself in the sacred waters and culture of this triennial celebration.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trekking accross the barren wastelands of the Australian Outback by rail reveals the desert's unique culture.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: In Venezuela, the Orinoco River was the first to be discovered in the new world and was thought to be the route to El Dorado.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Ruth Wright's First United Church welcomes all those who have bottomed out on their luck in Vancouver.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rabbi Shifren takes inner city LA high school students surfing for the first time to get them out of their 'world is a ghetto mentality.'

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Here, 100 million Hindus have gathered to wash away their sins in the holy rivers near Allahabad, on the banks of Sangam. It is also where Dominic's friend Sir James Mallinson will be initiated into a senior role called a mahant. Follow these friends on this incredible two-week journey, and submerge yourself in the sacred waters and culture of this triennial celebration.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Burlesque artist Dita von Teese drops by to find the perfect frock for a red-carpet event, while a costume designer from "Glee" shops for the cast's wardrobe. It's just another day at the office inside L.A.'s finest vintage store, The Way We Wore(r).

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: 40 UNDER 40
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes of the "40 under 40: Craft Futures" exhibition, featuring traditional and non-traditional works of decorative art created by the top 40 American craft artists under the age of 40.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey along the Adriatic Coast where long sandy beaches meet rocky cliffs, ancient monasteries, harbour towns and ancient inland villages, see a land rich in artistic heritage.

Clip.Title: MINDFIELD
Clip.Episode: The Sky is not the Limit Part 2
Clip.EpisodeSummary: What happens when a small group of hardworking sleep deprived and under funded university students take on some of the brightest engineering minds in North America at NASA's Space Elevator Games? Follow as they prepare for and compete at Edward's Airforce Base for NASA's top prize - $2 million dollars.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Preservation of the World's National Parks
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The world's national parks have become vital sanctuaries and many only exist through the persistence and advocacy of small groups who care deeply about the earth's natural spaces. See how communities rescued the Golden Gate National Recreation Area from industrial development and what's being done today to protect its dramatic landscapes.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Biofuels: Beyond Ethanol, Plug-In Hybrids and Natural History Museum Goes Green
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Are biofuels the perfect solution, or just a new part of the problem? Explore the next generation of green fuel alternatives. With the hopes of curbing auto's addiction to oil, a group of hybrid hackers is launching a green car revolution by souping up Toyota's Prius. And, find out what one of the oldest, largest natural history museums in the world is doing to go green.

Clip.Title: B-2: STEALTH AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The most expensive and specialized airplane ever built, the B-2 Stealth bomber carries a price tag of more than two billion dollars. Highly effective and extremely technically advanced, it has been an integral part of the Air Force arsenal for the past 20 years.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.
